alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 18 at 10:11PM PDT until August 18 at 11:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 1011 PM PDT, Thunderstorms moved through areas east Twentynine Palms and Wonder Valley earlier this evening. Flash flooding remains possible mainly from Twentynine Palms eastward. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Twentynine Palms, Twentynine Palms Base and Twentynine Palms Airport. This includes the following roads... State Route 62 in San Bernardino County between mile markers 23 and 57. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
